name: LUX ALTERNA
description:
Lux Alterna; 

Move your character with WASD to lead the monsters over the correctly colored tiles, but don't let them catch you! Use SPACEBAR to toggle color and switch monsters.

Music: Spirit Blossom - RomanBelov

Programming: Alex Rose / Safety Dad Studios
Visuals: Cheryl Cruz, Jared Thome

Released: February 5, 2022
